Title: The Surviving Teacher
Descriptions: O my good.. I was hearing some shoots, i really think that's it. My name is "Elena Petrova". I am a teacher and I work in a school. One day, bandits came and ambushed the school. I hid in a room, terrified for my life. I could hear the chaos outside, the screams of my students, and the gunshots. I stayed hidden until I saw you.. I not have what to do here anymore, please bring me to the camp! I have Printer, that only one what's left here, I will give it to you if you help me...
Thank you for bringing me here %1. I will stay here for now and warm myself up first before I think about what to do next..
